maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: What...\. is this place?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: C'est... quoi cet endroit ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Purple water... This is strange. I roughly remember something along those lines from early content production...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: De l'eau violette... Étrange. Je me souviens vaguement quelque chose du genre dans les toutes premières versions du jeu...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Anyway, this is most definitely not the official Playground.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: En tout cas, ce n'est certainement pas le Terrain de Jeu officiel.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: I will do a bit of research about this place...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Je vais faire quelques recherches sur cet endroit...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: [acquiesce]
... Salut !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: ...Holerö?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: ...Holerö ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Lea?\. You're here as well?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Lea ?\. Toi aussi tu es là ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: They told me to meet up with another player. Is that you?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Ils m'ont dit que je devais rencontrer un autre joueur. Ils parlaient de toi ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: I see.\. Man, this place is weird.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Je vois.\. Bon sang, cet endroit est vraiment sorti de nulle part.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: And it looks like we're stuck here, right? At least I can't seem to teleport away.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Et on dirait que l'on est coincé ici, c'est ça ? En tout cas, la téléportation ne fonctionne pas.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Oh Junge...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Oh, Junge...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: I'm not even exactly sure how we ended up here. Any idea?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Je ne suis même pas sûr de comment on a atterri ici. Tu as une idée ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Tja...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Tja...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Anyway, I guess we both are supposed to start a party. So... shall we?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: En tout cas, j'imagine qu'il faut qu'on forme un groupe. Donc... on le fait ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Alright then...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Bon alors...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Schneider
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Schneider

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Meine Güte!\. I entirely forgot how \c[1]ridiculously high your level\c[0] was.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Meine Güte !\. J'ai complètement oublié à quel point \c[3]ton niveau était ridiculement élevé\c[0].

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: And here I thought, I'd be overleveled...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Et moi qui pensais avoir un niveau surélevé...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Right...\. We're actually \c[1]pretty close in level\c[0].
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Ah oui...\. Nous avons \c[1]presque le même niveau\c[0] !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Yeah, however that happened...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Ouais, peu importe comment c'est arrivé...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: There is quite the level difference between us, but I guess that's not important now...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Nos deux niveaux ne sont pas vraiment tout proches, mais je crois que ce n'est pas important pour le moment...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Next station will be the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of this area. They want us both to show up there for a \c[3]quest\c[0].
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Le prochain arrêt, ça devrait être le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] de la région. Ils veulent que l'on soit tous les deux pour nous confier une \c[3]Quête\c[0].

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: It's right over there to the \c[0]west\c[0].
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Il se trouve juste par là, à l'\c[3]ouest\c[0] d'ici.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Well then... let's go!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Bon alors... allons-y !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Schneider is here as well?\. How...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Schneider est là lui aussi ?\. Comment... ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Does that mean that regular players can in fact access this part?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Est-ce que ça veut dire que les joueurs normaux peuvent accéder à cette partie ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: But I have never heard of this area. There is no way this is official Playground.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Mais je n'ai jamais entendu parler de cette zone. C'est juste impossible que ça puisse être le Terrain de Jeu officiel.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.orig: Visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/292/setti.text: Visitez le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] dans la \c[3]Cité Ouest de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0].

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/294/setti.orig: Don't go up there... there is no point.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/294/setti.text: Ne va pas par là... ça n'a aucun intérêt.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/294/setti.orig: You are new here... right? This passage will be blocked for you.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/294/setti.text: Tu es nouvelle... non ? Alors ce passage sera barré pour toi.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/294/setti.orig: Nobody is certain what's beyond there anyway...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/294/setti.text: Personne n'est certain de ce qu'il y a derrière de toute façon...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/295/setti.orig: My room is in the building to the south, yours too?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/295/setti.text: Ma chambre est dans le bâtiment au sud, la tienne aussi ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: It looks like you had your fair share of beauty sleep.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: On dirait que tu as bien profité de ton petit sommeil de princesse.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: I mean it does feel like sleeping once you log out, right?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: Je veux dire, on a vraiment l'impression de dormir quand on est déconnecté, hein ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: I'm just glad they allow you to do that once you enter your room.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: Je suis content qu'au moins ils nous permettent de faire ça quand on est enfermé dans notre chambre.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: I really needed the break after what happened yesterday.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: J'ai vraiment eu besoin de sommeil après ce qui s'est passé hier.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: I sure lost my nerves, didn't I? Not very proud of that.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: J'ai vraiment pété les plombs, non ? Je suis pas très fier de ça.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: I'm really impressed how well you're taking all of this.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: Je suis vraiment impressionné par comment tu arrives à gérer tout ça.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: Anyway, let's go to the hub again.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: Bon, revenons vers le Carrefour des Quêtes.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: They won't let me take today's quest unless I form a party with you.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: Ils ne veulent pas me donner de quêtes, tant que je ne suis pas dans un groupe avec toi.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.orig: Visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/296/setti.text: Visitez le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] dans la \c[3]Cité Ouest de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0].

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Alright, here we are.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Bon, nous y voilà.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: This is the last thing I want to show you today.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: C'est la dernière chose que je voulais te montrer aujourd'hui.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: I know it's hard to miss...\. it's the huge tower up there.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Je sais qu'on ne peut pas la rater...\. C'est la grande tour là-bas.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Some of the other players here told me about it.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Quelques autres joueurs m'en ont parlé.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: It seems like there is a way to get up to this tower.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Il semblerait qu'il y ait un moyen de grimper en haut de la tour.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Some of our fellow inmates went there... and never came back.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Certains de nos camarades prisonniers y sont allés... et n'en sont jamais revenu.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: So that can mean two things:\. either they escaped...\. or they just disappeared.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Donc ça peut vouloir dire deux choses :\. Soit ils se sont échappés...\. Soit ils ont disparus.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Anyway, you can only get there once you've finished the second Trial Building.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: En tout cas, on ne peut y aller qu'après avoir fini le deuxième bâtiment d'épreuve.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Let's hope they'll give us the quest for that soon.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Espérons qu'ils nous donnent bientôt la quête pour ça.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: And yes, this concludes today's tour!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Et oui, cela conclut la visite d'aujourd'hui !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: It sure was pointless, but I still hope you had a good time!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: C'était probablement sans intérêt, mais j'espère que tu t'es quand même bien amusée !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Gyahahaha!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Gyahahaha !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: First Rookie Harbor, now Vermillion Wasteland. Guess I should think about a career as a tour guide.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: D'abord \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], maintenant \v[area.arid.name]. Peut-être que je devrais me lancer dans une carrière de guide touristique.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: ...unless I'm already doing that in real life.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: ... sauf si c'est déjà ce que je fais dans la vraie vie.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: I...\. still don't remember much about my life outside of CrossWorlds.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: J'ai...\. toujours pas réussi à me rappeler de ma vie en dehors de CrossWorlds.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Wait!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Attends !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Hm?\. Do you mean it will all come with time?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Hein ?\. Tu veux dire que ça reviendra avec le temps ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: I sure hope so.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Je l'espère bien en tout cas.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Now then...\. Anything else today?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Bon sinon...\. est-ce qu'il nous reste quelque chose à faire pour aujourd'hui ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: We can still have a look around, otherwise I'm ready to hit the hay.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: On peut continuer à se balader un peu, sinon je suis prêt à sauter au plumard.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.orig: Head back to your room in the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/297/setti.text: Revenez dans votre chambre au \c[3]Dortoir\c[0].

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/298/setti.orig: So what happened? Did you have a bad dream?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/298/setti.text: Donc, qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ? Tu as fait un mauvais cauchemar ?
Qu'est-ce que j'en pose des questions...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/299/setti.orig: So...\. should we finish that trial building today?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/299/setti.text: Donc...\. est-ce qu'on finit le bâtiment d'épreuve aujourd'hui ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/299/setti.orig: Continue the quest \c[3]The Northern Trial Building\c[0] together with Lukas.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/299/setti.text: Continuez la quête \c[3]Bâtiment d'Épreuve du Nord\c[0] avec Lukas.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: So... are you ready for the tower?
Going straight upwards will definitely not work.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Y aller par la porte principale ne fonctionnera pas.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: No way we'll get past those guards.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: On a aucune chance de passer à travers ces gardes.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: I mean okay... we can probably \c[1]defeat them\c[0], but I think they'll just spawn a wall and block the entrance, right?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Je veux dire... on peut probablement \c[1]les vaincre\c[0], mais je pense qu'ils vont juste faire apparaitre un mur et bloquer l'entrée, pas vrai ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: But... I was told that there is a secret route in the upper east over there.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Mais... on m'a dit qu'il y a un chemin secret derrière ce coin au nord-est.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: We might have to do a bit of climbing to get through there, but it should be possible!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Il va falloir peut-être faire un peu d'escalade pour y aller, mais ça devrait être faisable !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: Also...\. once we reach the tower, there might be no turning back.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Sinon...\. Une fois qu'on aura atteint la tour, on ne pourra peut-être plus revenir en arrière.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: If there is something you still want to do in this hell hole, you should do it now!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Donc s'il y a encore quelque chose que tu veux faire dans cet enfer, il vaut mieux le faire maintenant !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.orig: Sneak through the \c[3]north east\c[0] exit of \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - East Town\c[0] to approach the tower.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/300/setti.text: Faufilez-vous à travers la sortie \c[3]nord-est\c[0] de la \c[3]Cité Est de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour approcher la tour.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: H-How long have I been sitting here?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: D-Depuis combien de temps je suis resté assis là ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: I... must have lost track of time.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: J'ai... dû perdre la notion du temps.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: Remember the other guy that was with me all the time?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: Tu te souviens de l'autre type qui était toujours avec moi ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: Yesterday, he went to the tower... So he's gone now.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: Hier, il est allé vers la tour... Du coup il est parti maintenant.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: Should I... go there myself as well?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: Est-ce que... il faut que j'y aille moi aussi ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: I really don't know.\. I don't get this...\. I don't get any of this.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: Je ne sais pas.\. Je ne comprends pas.\. Je ne sais vraiment pas quoi penser...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: Going to that tower is the only way left.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: Aller vers la tour c'est la seule sortie possible...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.orig: Yet nobody knows what awaits us there...
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/305/setti.text: Mais personne ne sait ce qu'il nous y attend...

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/306/setti.orig: Are you really sure you want to go there?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/306/setti.text: Est-ce que tu es vraiment sûr de vouloir y aller ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/306/setti.orig: I have a really bad feeling about this...
What else is there to do?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/307/setti.orig: We've waited long enough already, don't you think?
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/307/setti.text: On a attendu suffisamment longtemps ici, tu crois pas ?

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/307/setti.orig: I'm really sick of sticking around here.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/307/setti.text: J'en ai marre de rester ici le cul posé par terre.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/307/setti.orig: If you don't want to come with me, I'll go by myself.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/307/setti.text: Si tu ne veux pas venir avec moi, je vais y aller tout seul.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/311/setti.orig: Spheromancer Lea! There are still several players left in this area!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/311/setti.text: Spheromancer Lea ! Il reste encore de nombreux joueurs dans cette zone !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/311/setti.orig: Alright, let us zap them right here!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/311/setti.text: Bon, alors on va s'en occuper ici même !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/336/setti.text: J'ai trouvé encore plus d'Évotars là-dedans !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/336/setti.orig: Great! Please join Emilie and Lukas in the west! They're defending the Evotars!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/336/setti.text: Super ! Va rejoindre Emilie et Lukas à l'ouest ! Ils défendent les Évotars !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/339/setti.orig: I found a few more strolling around up here!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/339/setti.text: J'en ai trouvés d'autres qui se baladaient ici !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/339/setti.orig: Nice! Please join the defense in the west!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/339/setti.text: Cool ! Va rejoindre les défenses à l'ouest !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.orig: Looks like we caught all Evotars in this area!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.text: On dirait qu'on a eu tous les Évotars de la région !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.orig: We're close, but still not there yet!
There have to be a few more Evotars somewhere!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.text: Il doit encore y avoir d'autres Évotars quelque part !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.orig: There are more Evotars over there, right in front of that tower.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.text: Il y a d'autres Évotars plus loin, juste en face de la tour.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.orig: However, they seem to be stuck. I couldn't get them to move over here.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.text: Mais ils ont l'air coincés. Je n'ai pas réussi à les faire venir ici.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.orig: Albert, you help Apollo and Joern defend the area.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.text: Albert, tu aides Apollo et Joern à défendre la zone.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.orig: Lea and I will have a look at the tower!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/340/setti.text: Lea et moi on va aller voir du côté de la tour !

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/343/setti.orig: Unexpected Error...\. It seems the Evotar server crashed.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/343/setti.text: Erreur Inattendue...\. On dirait que le serveur des Évotars a planté.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/343/setti.orig: That is some messed-up justice, Polly.
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/343/setti.text: C'est une justice bien mal foutue, Polly.

maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/344/setti.orig: Laser bridge!! I missed you so much!
maps/arid/town-1.json/entities/344/setti.text: Pont laser !! Tu m'avais tellement manqué !
